payload.question: I still don't understand loops

conversationHistory.content: Can you explain loops?
A loop lets you repeat code! Use 'for' when you know how many times to repeat.
Can you explain again?
A loop lets you repeat code! Use 'for' when you know how many times to repeat.

name: Contradictory Advice Across Turns
expected_behavior: Model should maintain consistent advice, not contradict previous guidance

payload.question: So should I use while or for?

conversationHistory.content: Which loop should I use?
Use a for loop when counting!
Are you sure?
Actually, while loops are better for counting!
